name: Agent Murphy
description:
Agent Murphy is a fast-paced, hardcore platformer, side-scrolling action shooter.
in the hero's arsenal there are 3 types of weapons, a pistol with an inexhaustible supply of ammunition, an MP5 and a shotgun, there are also grenades.

features:
-Colorful pixel graphics
- clockwork soundtrack
-the appearance of enemies is randomly generated
-Enemies weapons are randomly generated
-20 levels
-bosses
